mapper.update: update tb_completion set state = #{state}, update_time=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select c._date, c.state, c.update_time, t._name 'taskInfo.name', t.sponsor_id 'taskInfo.sponsor.id', t.start_time 'taskInfo.start', t.end_time 'taskInfo.end', t.s_type 'taskInfo.sponsor.type', t.room_id 'taskInfo.room.id' from tb_completion c,tb_taskinfo t where c.taskinfo_id=t._id and t.grade_id=#{grade} and #{time} between t.start_time and t.end_time and #{date}=c._date and #{checker}=t.checker_id and #{c_type}=t.c_type and #{type}=t.type
SELECT t.`sponsor.id` from tb_taskinfo t,tb_completion c WHERE c.id=#{compId} AND t.id=c.`taskInfo.id`
